The work shown functioned as a

choices.label: memory aide to help prepare sailors for ocean voyages
symbolic map representing the unity of a maritime kingdom
representation of the ancestral connections between different maritime clans
scientifically accurate map to be carried on voyages into foreign territories

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
